instructions: Cook spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with grated Parmesan on top.
servingSuggestion: Serve with garlic bread and salad.

instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice into strips.
Toss the lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing together.
Top the salad with chicken and Parmesan cheese.
servingSuggestion: Serve with a lemon wedge and extra dressing on the side.

instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until translucent.
Add the rest of the vegetables and stir-fry for 10 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
servingSuggestion: Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

instructions: Whisk together flour, eggs, and milk until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan and pour in batter to form pancakes.
Cook each side until golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup.
servingSuggestion: Top with fresh berries or banana slices.

instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil until softened.
Add chopped tomatoes and vegetable stock.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
servingSuggestion: Serve with a side of crusty bread.
